titleStmt.title: Edwin M. Stanton to John W. Finnell
CWG14477

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Handwritten Transcriptions of Civil War Telegrams

body.p:
Washington D.C
Sept 25th 1862
To Adj Gen Finnell

The absence of the Adjutant
64
General has occasioned delay in responding to your telegram of the 17th instant respecting Cavalry regiments_ Your regiments being organized may stand without regard to the last order

E. M. Stanton
Secretary of War
